sentences.en: At that speed the plane began to disintegrate.
sentences.cn: 飞机以那种速度飞行时开始解体.

sentences.en: Beholders usually carve out underground lairs for themselves using their disintegrate rays.
sentences.cn: 眼魔经常用它们的解离射线雕刻自己的地底巢穴.

sentences.en: But the bonds between my parents and sisters continued to disintegrate.
sentences.cn: 但父母与我们姐妹间的关系仍在分崩离析.

sentences.en: Does it have any effect against the disintegrate spell or disintegrate power?
sentences.cn: “星质护甲”异能对“解离术”法术或异能 呢 ?

sentences.en: During October 1918 the Austro-Hungarian Empire began to disintegrate.
sentences.cn: 在1918年10月间，奥匈帝国开始瓦解。

sentences.en: Fixed a bug where most weapons will never disintegrate in combat.
sentences.cn: 修复在格斗时许多武器无法粉碎的错误.

sentences.en: Heard in the samsara the soul more is tenacious easier to disintegrate.
sentences.cn: 听说轮回里灵魂越是固执越易瓦解.

sentences.en: Rocks disintegrate because of the effects of wind and water.
sentences.cn: 岩石由于风和水的作用而分裂.

sentences.en: The family is starting to disintegrate.
The physical matter will disintegrate but you will not.
The plane just disintegrated in mid-air.
sentences.cn: 飞机就在半空中解体了。

sentences.en: The plane would probably disintegrate at that high speed.
sentences.cn: 飞机以那么高速飞行也许会四分五裂.

sentences.en: The rate at which radioactive elements disintegrate varies from one element to another.
sentences.cn: 放射性元素的衰变速度随元素种类的不同而不同.

sentences.en: These products must disintegrate and dissolve before absorption can occur.
sentences.cn: 这些制剂必须经过崩解和溶解才能被吸收.

sentences.en: To pass the water test the catalyst should not disintegrate or crumble.
sentences.cn: 经过泡水试验,催化剂应不开裂或破碎.

trans.tran_en: to break up, or make something break up, into very small pieces
